findTournamentsByString.name: Three Horsemen Battle Royale
findTournamentsByString.description:
### About This Tournament
One of the first NFT team events including automatic payouts!! You want to make history?

### Rules

- 4 players per team (3+1 sub)
- 3 players will play in each match up and you may swap out your sub inbetween matches, but not once the match has begun!

### Fromat

- Each matchup will be Bo3 sets
- Each set is a Bo3 between 1 player from each team
- First team to win 2 Bo3's moves on

### Match Reporting Details

- Both captains please send the results to the Admin.

 

### Other Details

- Region: Global
-  Have Fun!

findTournamentsByString.name: Axie Infinity Community Cup #1
findTournamentsByString.description:
Axie Infinity Community Cup #1

### Rules ###

REPORT ALL MATCH RESULTS TO ZEE#6672 ON DISCORD 

PLEASE ADD ZEE AS A FRIEND IN GAME SO I CAN BROADCAST YOUR MATCHES =)

Tournament starts June 27th at 2PM GMT.

Anyone with 3 axies can sign up (up to 64 players).

Please sign up using your current discord name. This will be needed so you
can coordinate with your opponent to play your matches. 

All matches excluding the top 4 matches are a best of 3 games. The top 4 will be a best of 5 games.

The first round of matches begins at the beginning of the hour. You have 1 hour to finish your first match. PLEASE do not play ahead of the schedule.

After the first round you will have 45 minutes to complete your match and report the results. 

Please complete your matches on time. There are no exclusions.  

If an opponent fails to play the match, the match will be given to the player that was present and ready to play. 

If for any reason both players do not appear to be present or report their match a player will be chosen randomly so the bracket can move forward. PLEASE BE PRESENT for your match and PLEASE REPORT the results. 

- Match Reporting Details -
1. All contestants will report in game and is discord at 2PM GMT (This is GMT so please use a time converter to convert your local time into GMT).

2. Communication will be through discord so please download discord if you have not already https://discord.com/ and come join the Axie Infinity server https://discord.gg/68DeTqc. 

3. Get in contact with your opponent. This will be done through discord. I will have a channel specifically for this tournament so finding your opponent should be fairly easy. 

4. Add your opponent in game. This can be done by going to the friends tab at the bottom right of the Axie Infinity starting interface. Then click add friend. Once they are added you will see a request battle icon next to their name. 

5. When the match is complete BOTH players please report the results of the match to the designated person. EXAMPLE: Zee vs Chief 2-1 (Zee)

IF YOU HAVE ANY OTHER QUESTIONS PLEASE GET IN CONTACT WITH ZEE ON THE AXIE INFINITY DISCORD

### Match Reporting Details

- Report scores  to Chief


### Other Details

- Region: Global

- NFT Gaming

findTournamentsByString.name: CGNY Valorant Tournament
findTournamentsByString.description:
Get your Valorant squad together and sign up for our $1000 Tournament on June 14th! Details Below.
About this Event
Community Gaming is teaming up with BrookLAN to host our first Valorant Tournament on June 14th!

$1000 + the HyperX Valorant Starter Kit is up for grabs as up to 16 teams battle it out for the top spot.

Anyone from NA can enter! Players DO NOT need to be from Brookyln to compete.

**HOW TO REGISTER** You Register on this Eventbrite page with your Team of 5 OR you can register by yourself and we'll pair you up with other players this week to start practicing with.

Looking for more team mates? Join our Discord and post in the #Valorant channel: https://discord.gg/bxPNem5

-------------

**FORMAT** Double Elimination. Matches will be Best of 1 until Top 3 (Winners Finals, Losers Finals, Grand Finals) which will be Best of 3.

Bans and vetos goes by coin flip. The winner of the flip bans the a map then 2nd team bans another map. The first team then chooses the map to play from the remaining 2 choices.

-------------

**PRIZE POOL**

1st: $500

2nd: $300

3rd: $125

4th: $75

The Tournament will be live-streamed at https://www.twitch.tv/communitygamingny with commentary from Upmind (@Upmind_)

-------------

**FAQ**

Anyone from NA can enter! Players DO NOT need to be from Brookyln to compete.

Check-in will start at 10am EST in our Discord in the #Valorant channel: https://discord.gg/bxPNem5

For match setup, players are allowed to turn on Valorant's in-game cheat menu to enable match pausing. You are ONLY allowed to pause the match during the buy phase. You are NOT allowed to pause the match during any other phase.

Don't know what to expect? Check out our hype video from past Community Gaming events ðŸŽ®: https://www.facebook.com/541664245938834/videos/159697505481654/

-----------

**JUNE 14th SCHEDULE**

11:00 AM - CHECK-IN STARTS

11:45 AM - BRACKETS CLOSE

12:00 AM - TOURNAMENT STARTS

6:00 PM - DAY 1 ENDS

Reach out to cg@cgnylan.com with any questions!

THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS!

BrookLAN is an esports lounge and events space in the heart of Brooklyn, NY. Equipped with 50 PCs, 25 consoles, stream rooms, a restaurant + bar, and a full 6v6 competitive stage. Opening Summer 2020. Sign up for updates at www.brooklan.com


HyperX is the gaming division of Kingston Technology Company, Inc., the worldâ€™s largest independent memory manufacturer, with the goal of providing gamers, PC builders, PC, console and mobile power users with high-performance components.

For 16 years, the HyperX mission has been to develop gaming products for all types of gamers â€“ high-speed memory, solid state drives, headsets, keyboards, mice, charging accessories for console players, USB flash drives, and mousepads â€“ to the gaming community and beyond.

findTournamentsByString.name: SkyWeaver Tournament
findTournamentsByString.description:
## Welcome to the first BattleDAO SkyWeaver Tournament! 

This is a test tournament to gather feedback on the platform as we look to add more features and improve usability for SkyWeaver players. 

Please join the #tournaments channel in the Skyweaver Discord to coordinate setting up your custom match lobby with your designated opponent. If you have any issues you can message Chris G on Discord.


### **FORMAT**

The format will be a Best of 1, Single Elimination tournament using Constructed decks. You may switch decks in between rounds if you choose.



### **PRIZE POOL**

The Prize Pool will be 1000 RDAI! Unfortunately RDAI is a test token and is not worth anything. But future tournaments will have real prizing! :)

findTournamentsByString.name: SkyWeaver Gaming Tournament, Powered by Infura
findTournamentsByString.description:
## About this Event

Infura is partnering with Horizon Games and [Maker](https://makerdao.com/) to bring you the [SkyWeaver](https://www.skyweaver.net/) Gaming Tournament at [NFT.NYC](https://www.nft.nyc/) **February 20th at 1:00 PM EST**!

SkyWeaver is a digital Trading Card Game that paves the way for Play2Earn games. Play casually, or compete on the worldwide leaderboard to win cards that become your property. Play your cards in battle, construct a legendary deck, and trade or sell your cards in the marketplace. Built on Ethereum and partnering with Infura, SkyWeaver pioneers a new dimension of gaming

 ## PRIZE POOL 

- 1st place: 500 DAI ($500 USD) + 50 silver cards
- 2nd: 300 DAI ($300 USD) + 30 silvers cards
- 3rd: 100 DAI ($100 USD) + 10 silver cards
- 4th: 100 DAI ($100 USD) + 10 silver cards
- 5th - 16th: 1 silver card each


 [Maker](https://makerdao.com/) is the creator of the Dai stablecoin and the leader in the DeFi space. Dai is the top stablecoin of the blockchain gaming ecosystem. 


 ## FORMAT 

 The format will be a Best of 3 single elimination tournament using Constructed decks. New players are welcome and can play with an above average preconstructed SkyWeaver deck for the tournament! You'll also get access to in-game currency which you can use on the marketplace to improve your deck further! 

## POWERED BY [INFURA](https://infura.io/)

Infura offers developers fast, reliable access to Ethereum-based blockchain tools and infrastructure. Our core service is free and provides everything you and your fellow game developers need to build awesome games on blockchain networks. Head to [Infura.io/register](https://infura.io/register) and start building for free with one line of code!
